name: Where's my crown?
description:
Being a princess is not easy... Especially when an evil witch steals your crown and sells it to goblins! Now you have to collect all the golden coins to be able to buy your crown back. But be aware of monsters, they bite!

Cute and creepy at the same time... Kid-friendly.

Level 1, project in development.

Three modes available:

  • top-down view with mouse-only control,
  • top-down view with keyboard control while playing + mouse GUI, 
  • first-person view with keyboard control while playing + mouse GUI.
